## css2hsv() function

Convert a standard CSS color to an { h, s, v } object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function css2hsv(css: string, _alpha?: number): Hsv;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  css | string | the css color hex string |
|  \_alpha | number | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Hsv](./color.hsv.md)
